questions.question: What is the dominant color of the visible portion of the product?
What appears to be the primary material used in the product's construction?
Considering the overall form, what best describes the product's shape?
Based on visual texture, how would you characterize the product's surface?
Does the image show any noticeable seams or stitching on the product's surface?
Judging by the image, what is the general level of sheen or gloss on the surface?
From the visual evidence, what is the apparent overall size of the product?
Observing the form carefully, how many distinct sections or parts are visible?
Describing the form, what geometric shape most closely resembles the back part?
Considering its form and texture, what is the likely intended function?
What is the apparent uniformity of color across the visible surface area?
Are there any visible patterns, designs or logos present on the product?
Judging from the image, what kind of visual texture would you expect to the touch?
Does the visible section seem to be a single piece or multiple assembled parts?
Based on the image, is the object’s form symmetrical or asymmetrical?
